channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Lady From Spain
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Alan Ritner Anderson)
item.description: Only J. Fenimore Yost could have put such diverse elements as a dead kitten, a trunkful of lottery tickets, and a long-lost daughter together and make them spell murder!
